snippet: SORRE--Charlotte, passed away peacefully at her home in New York City on March 8, 2016. Mrs. Sorre was a renowned portrait artist specializing in thoroughbred race horses, show dogs, and personal paintings. Beloved mother of Mark and Elena, adored grandmother of Lucia and Charlie. Memorial service and donations to be announced at a later date. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SORRE--Charlotte, passed away peacefully at her home in New York City on March 8, 2016.
